<h1 align="center" id="title">Agribot</h1>

<p id="description">This is the user apps used to remotely monitor the inspection done by Agribot (Autonomous Produce Sorting System)</p>

<h2>Project Screenshots:</h2>

<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/71698316/338498781-11b59fd7-4546-464a-bd63-1eb4cdb2625f.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..oRzmNMJN382DFXXGCFBFmHtC2a1H2zAOzlwgYJlRFr4" alt="project-screenshot" width="400" height="400/">

  
  
<h2>üßê Features</h2>

Here're some of the project's best features:

*   Monitor the inspection statistics of a site (multiple machines)
*   Monitor the inspection statistics of a machine
*   View the images of inspection
